sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates an invoice document in SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for the SAP S/4HANA – RFC spoke.
  • Invoice Header - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Invoice
    • Document type
    • Document Date
    • Posting Date
    • Reference
    • Company Code
    • Invoicing Party
    • Currency
    • ISO Code
    • Direct quoted exchange rate
    • Indirect quoted exchange rate
    • Gross invoice amount
    • Calculate tax
    • Terms of Payment
    • Baseline Payment Dte
    • Days 1
    • Days 2
    • Days Net
    • Disc.percent 1 [ DSCT_PCT1 ]
    • Disc.percent 1 [ DSCT_PCT2 ]
    • IV category
    • Document Header Text
    • Payment Block
    • Unplanned del. costs
    • Tax code del.costs
    • Jurisdiction code
    • Created by
    • Payment Method
    • Pmt meth. supplement
    • Invoice Document No.
    • SCB Indicator
    • Supplying Cntry
    • Service Indicator
    • Reference
    • Discount Amount
    • PBC/POR number
    • Check digit
    • POR reference number
    • Payee
    • Part.bank type
    • House bank
    • Assignment
    • Payment reference
    • InR.Reference number
    • Fiscal year
    • Invoice receipt date
    • Planning Level
    • Planning Date
    • Fixed
    • Business Area
    • Lot number
    • Text
    • Nota fiscal type
    • EU triangular deal
    • Reporting country
    • VAT Registration No.
    • Business place
    • Rate for taxes
    • Investment ID
    • Due Date for Retention (Default)
    • Delivery posting (Inv/Cr)
    • Returns posting(in/cr)
    • Transaction
    • Simulate Invoice
    • Branch Code
  • Invoice Lines - List of objects containing these fields:
    • Invoice Item
    • Purchase order
    • Item
    • Reference Document
    • Year current period
    • Reference Doc. Item
    • Subseq. Debit/Credit
    • Tax Code
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Amount
    • Quantity
    • Order Unit
    • Order unit in ISO
    • Qty in OPUn
    • Order Price Unit
    • Pur.Ord. PU ISO
    • Condition type
    • Step number
    • Counter
    • Entry Sheet
    • Text
    • Final Invoice
    • Line Number
    • GR/IR Clearing
    • Vendor
    • W/o Cash Dscnt
    • Retention in Document Currency
    • Retention in Percent
    • Due Date for Retention
    • Item Not Relevant to Retention
    • Valuation Type
    • Grouping Char. for Invoice Verification
    • Origin of an Invoice Item
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Invoice Details - Invoice document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP S/4HANA - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Create Invoice
